headline.main: Talk With Petain Viewed as Prophetic as Darlan Loses Favor With Nazis and Deposed Aide's Friends Gain in Influence

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 31 -- In the opinion of diplomatic observers in Vichy, former Vice Premier Pierre Laval may be called back to office in the near future. Such is the construction put by these observers on the meeting of Marshal Henri Philippe Petain with his former Vice President of the Council in Randan last Thursday.
abstract: Pertinax on Petain-Laval Mar conf; Darlan seen losing favor as Laval steps to fore
